name: Johnston’s ‘Railway’ Sans
tagline: Edward Johnston’s gift to Legibility and our Modern Typographic Legacy
body:
Railway Sans
============

An open source version of Edward Johnston’s Timeless Typeface for London Underground of 1916

See: http://typotech.blogspot.co.uk/ for more background.

![Railway Sans Example](http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e8FgqfKzDVQ/UB67C5hGGWI/AAAAAAAAAPI/PQU6C4s3RaA/s1600/railway_2.png)


Wed 22 Aug 2012 19:19:35 BST
